Name: NOTED
Author: Tischel
Description:
Lets you create notes that are linked to specific duties (they will only show during those duties).
You can also tie notes to certain jobs so they only appear when on the right job.
Changelog:
1.2.1.0

- Removed duplicated duty entries.
- Added support for the Tab key when writing notes.
- Fixed visual issues in the settings windows.
- Fixed crash with notes containing the "%" character
